InstallTask.additionalUiContext: (Requires registering and application on Warmap Discord for full access)
InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Launch Safeties cannot be disabled in online mode to ensure a level playing field for all players.\n\nBy playing in online mode you agree to your gameplay data being sent to and stored by the online server. This includes company, unit and battle statistics.;;Yes, I understand;;No thanks
InstallTask.uiDescription: Fight for your choosen faction against other players for supremacy over the Inner Sphere (Requires registering and application on Warmap Discord for full access, visit www.roguewar.org to find out how )
Offline Mode with Interactive Inner Sphere
Map is based on the Canon 2765 state of the InnerSphere
Map is based on the Canon 2786 state of the InnerSphere + Plus the Clans
Map is based on the Canon 3040 state of the InnerSphere
Map is based on the Canon 3075 state of the InnerSphere
Map is based on the Canon 3081-3086 state of the InnerSphere
Map is based on the Canon 3151 state of the InnerSphere

InstallTask.additionalUiContext: Challenge scales with the cost of your drops
InstallTask.uiDescription: Base difficulty goes up the more money your mechs are worth. 10,000,000 cbills per half-skull. It counts the your averaged deployment value for the last several missions. +5% Online Progress.
Every Planet has their own Difficulty Rating Some systems are difficult, some are easy.

InstallTask.additionalUiContext: Challenge scales with the cost of your mechs
InstallTask.uiDescription: Base difficulty goes up the more money your mechs are worth. 16,500,000 cbills per half-skull. It counts the most expensive mechs you can drop. Caps Online influence to 10 max.
Default Enemy Support Lances

InstallTask.promptText: Only the cheesiest and most unfair Murderbabies are to be found here. Hasta la vista, baby!\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Spank Me;;I'll pass
InstallTask.uiDescription: Max 1 Support Lance, Deadly Custom Mechs and High Level Pilots begin appearing at D16
Max 1 Support Lance, Lower chances, -50% Online Progress, Caps Online influence to 10 max
No Enemy Support Lances (except contract specific), -90% Online Progress, Caps Online influence to 6 max
Randomizes Combat Starting Position.
Disabled Random Combat Starting Position. -2% Online Progress.
Choose a Deployment Position on Mission Start. -2% Online Progress.
Ask for Deploy type before combat. -2% Online Progress.
InstallTask.uiName: Ask for Deploy type before combat

InstallTask.uiDescription: Your Units are automatically deployed.
Manually control Convoy Missions
Ai controls Convoy Missions.
Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.

InstallTask.uiDescription: DO NOT! Receive Allied Support on Tougher Contracts.
Standard Map Size.
33% Increased Map Size. +5% Online Progress.
66% Increased Map Size. +10% Online Progress.
100% Increased Map Size. +10% Online Progress. Can cause long mission load on some maps.
Damage and status effects as floaties around the mech, no Combat Log
Converts all Floaties to persistent Combat Log in the upper right corner
Start the Game with pre-defined Pilots. They have painted pictures and unused EXP
Start the Game with randomly generated, editable, Pilots. Ones like you commonly find in the hiring hall. +1% Online Progress.
Classic Skulls - Vanilla Style Skulls for Difficulty Ratings
Alternate Icons for difficulty rating with increasing numbers of Chevrons instead of only colour shifting - More accessible for colourblind players

InstallTask.additionalUiContext: Lances and Contracts to face Superior Skilled Forces.

InstallTask.uiDescription: Challenging Content! Customs and Pilots that push the Limits of whats Possible. +2% Online Progress.

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! This Includes extremely powerful random Encounters.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Let's RISC it!;;No

InstallTask.promptText: This content is not canonical and very powerful.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Science Rules!;;No, Science Dumb.
InstallTask.uiDescription: Unleash the desperate technologies and prototypes of the Society as they try to topple the Warrior Caste during the Wars of Reaving. +1% Online Progress.

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! These Behemoths will walk over you if unprepared.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Stompys!;;No
InstallTask.uiDescription: Challenging Content! End Game Content: Challenge Units above 100 Ton's, the Leviathans of the Modern Battlefield. +5% Online Progress.

InstallTask.promptText: Warning! Everyone will have access to Nuclear Weapons, including your enemies.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Nuke me from Orbit!;;No Way
InstallTask.uiDescription: Very Challenging Content! Nuclear Weapons, they are what they say they are! EXPECT TO BE WIPED INSTANTLY!

InstallTask.promptText: Challenging Content! These Prototypes will mince you up.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, Bring it!;;No

InstallTask.promptText: Enabling this will likely have a performance impact! Only quite weak computers could see any real benefit.\n\nAre you sure you want to enable?;;Yes, VFX Bad!;;No, VFX Good!
InstallTask.uiDescription: Disables some Filters and Shaders that offer a cleaner visual Experience, but removes important visual cues during missions. Is known to cause performance issues on most decent systems, only use if you are really sure you want/need it.
Disable Argo Ambient Chatter
Makes scorch marks permanent instead of fading in 40s
Colored and Unique Portraits for every Unit by Eternus

InstallTask.uiDescription: Greyscale Picture of every Mech

InstallTask.uiDescription: Armor Damage persists after Battle and requires time and money to repair. But base tech points are boosted. The suggested game mode.
Armor Damage does not persist after Battle. Just like vanilla. But you have fewer base MechTech points. Training Wheels Mode. -50% Online Progress, Caps Online influence to 10 max.
InstallTask.uiName: FREE Armor Repair After Battle - Lower base MechTech points

Use the default rendering style for BattleTech
Use multi-threaded rendering, may increase game performance
Performance fixes by Drowsy Corgi
